ingredients.ingredient: 1 (5 ounce) can light tuna in water, drained
1 (8 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
½ cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®)

cookingTips: Cook rice according to package directions and cool completely before mixing
Drain all canned ingredients thoroughly to prevent excess moisture in salad
Chill finished salad for at least 1 hour before serving for best flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the cook understand how to properly drain and combine canned ingredients to create a cohesive salad without excess liquid.
